sec.p: Data for CMIP5 models are available at https://esgf-node.llnl.gov/projects/esgf-llnl/. The CRU- 3.22 dataset is available from https://crudata.uea.ac.uk/cru/data/hrg/cru_ts_3.22/. The IITM dataset are available from http://www.tropmet.res.in/static_page.php?page_id = 54. The datasets generated during the current study are available from the corresponding author (KAR) on reasonable request.
